blogPost.title: How do doctors tell a brain-dead patient from a living one? Answer by Dinesh R P, MBBS, neurosurgery.  https://t.co/o6wHsft84e https://t.co/dVtYtCvVwI
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 医師はどのようにして、脳死状態の患者と生きている患者を見分けるのでしょうか？回答者：Dinesh R P, MBBS, 脳神経外科. https://t.co/o6wHsft84e https://t.co/dVtYtCvVwI
医生如何区分脑死亡的病人和活着的病人？回答者：Dinesh R P，MBBS，神经外科。https://t.co/o6wHsft84e。
醫生如何區分腦死亡的病人和活着的病人？回答者：Dinesh R P，MBBS，神經外科。https://t.co/o6wHsft84e。

previous.title: How hard is it to find and hire people with great AI skills or expertise for a new AI startup? Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/wOQNFHwajH https://t.co/OrrM5okMrL

localize.full_text: 对于一家新的人工智能创业公司来说，寻找和雇佣拥有优秀人工智能技能或专业知识的人有多难？回答者：@dojiboy9，联合创始人&amp；CEO @forethought_ai。https://t.co/wOQNFHwajH https://t.co/OrrM5okMrL。
對於一家新的人工智能創業公司來說，尋找和僱傭擁有優秀人工智能技能或專業知識的人有多難？回答者：@dojiboy9，聯合創始人&amp；CEO @forethought_ai。https://t.co/wOQNFHwajH https://t.co/OrrM5okMrL。

next.title: How do I apply top leadership lessons to home life during COVID-19? Answer by @alyssawestring, Author of Parents Who Lead. Associate Professor of Management @DePaulU. https://t.co/Ze7TK8ni9d https://t.co/6LD8u015Mk

localize.full_text: 如何在COVID-19期间将顶级领导力课程应用到家庭生活中？回答者：@alyssawestring，《领导的父母》作者。管理学副教授@DePaulU。https://t.co/Ze7TK8ni9d https://t.co/6LD8u015Mk
如何在COVID-19期間將頂級領導力課程應用到家庭生活中？回答者：@alyssawestring，《領導的父母》作者。管理學副教授@DePaulU。https://t.co/Ze7TK8ni9d https://t.co/6LD8u015Mk
